comet-ml/opik

Opik: Monitor and debug LLM applications

View on index

Related repos

  • Opik MCP server for IDE integration and unified access to prompts, projects, traces, metrics
  • Open source platform for developing, monitoring, and debugging LLM apps
  • Tool for testing LLM vulnerabilities
  • Helicone is an open-source platform to monitor, debug, and manage your LLM apps with features like agent tracing and prompt management
  • Unified interface for LLM providers
  • OSINT tool for dark web investigations using LLMs
  • Benchmark for LLMs on software engineering tasks
  • OpenLLMetry lets you add observability to your LLM apps using OpenTelemetry, so you can track and monitor model performance across popular platforms
  • cloud-native open-source platform for managing and monitoring LLM operations
